thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 02 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Tsogo Sun To Sell Casino Precinct Assets To Hospitality Property Fund

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Tsogo Sun To Sell Casino Precinct Assets To Hospitality Property Fund
text:
March 2 (Reuters) - Tsogo Sun Holdings Ltd:
* TSOGO SUN HOLDINGS LTD - - PROPOSED DISPOSAL TO HOSPITALITY PROPERTY FUND LIMITED, UNBUNDLING AND CAUTIONARY ANNOUNCEMENT
* TSOGO SUN HOLDINGS LTD - TSOGO AND HPF HAVE AGREED TO ACQUISITION BY HPF OF CERTAIN OF CASINO PRECINCT PROPERTIES CURRENTLY OWNED BY TSOGO GROUP
* TSOGO SUN HOLDINGS LTD - INITIAL AGGREGATE BASE RENTAL PAYABLE BY TENANT FOR PROPERTIES WILL BE R1.9 BILLION PER ANNUM
* TSOGO SUN HOLDINGS LTD - WILL RESTRUCTURE TSOGO GROUP INTO A PROPCO (HPF) AND OPCO (TSOGO) Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
